sentence.Network_en: You can add the fluid to the powder, or, conversely, the powder to the fluid.
sentence.Network_cn: 可把液体加入粉末，或者相反，把粉末加入液体。

sentence.Network_en: In real life, nobody was all bad, nor, conversely, all good.
sentence.Network_cn: 在现实生活中，没有彻头彻尾的坏人，相反地，也没有完完全全的好人。

拉丁语成语 ... [on the contrary] 相反地；反之 * [conversely] 反过来说；反之 * [decree of magistrate] 裁判官的告示 *.

LSAT红宝书1 - 豆丁网 ... contrariety 反对,矛盾,相反物 conversely 倒地,逆地 conversion 变换,转化.

在对话（Conversation）部分，你可以看到朋友和来自粉丝（这些粉丝也在同一时候签到）的评论。由于用户可以进行实时对话，这 …
-tion后缀 ... tergiversation 推脱, 搪塞, 背叛 conversation 会话, 交谈 cessation 停止.

entry.def: You say conversely to indicate that the situation you are about to describe is the opposite or reverse of the one you have just described.

example.ex: In real life, nobody was all bad, nor, conversely, all good.
example.tran: 在现实生活中，没有彻头彻尾的坏人，相反地，也没有完完全全的好人。

means.word_mean: 1. with the terms of the relation reversed;

auth_sentence.content: Conversely, warmer than average across much of Madagascar.
auth_sentence.res_content: Conversely, warmer than average across much of Madagascar.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Conversely, warmer than average across much of Madagascar.

auth_sentence.content: Conversely subsequent research has shown a completely different story.
auth_sentence.res_content: Conversely subsequent research has shown a completely different story.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Conversely subsequent research has shown a completely different story.

auth_sentence.content: Conversely, can an avatar be a crime victim?
auth_sentence.res_content: Conversely, can an avatar be a crime victim?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Conversely, can an avatar be a crime victim?

means.word_mean: 相反地, 颠倒地,反过来

jushi.english: This newspaper story could damage their reputation; conversely, it will give them a lot of free publicity.
jushi.chinese: 报纸上的这篇报道有可能损害他们的名誉,不过从另一方面来看,它将为他们做大量的免费宣传。
